Maximum allowed pairwise relative length difference (default: 1.1)

Maximum allowed sequence length to be trimmed in order to fix circularisation (default: 50000)
Maximum allowed percent relative sequence length to be trimmed in order to fix circularisation (default: 10.0)

Maximum allowed pairwise indel size (default: 250)
